message: I have a great deal for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a little high for me. Would you consider $70?
I can see you're a savvy negotiator, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $85.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle on $75? That's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting a bit impatient, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I can go. I'll sell it to you for $82.50.
I understand, Alice.  I'm also trying to get a fair deal here.  Would you be willing to do $78?  That's my final offer.
I've made concessions, Bob, but I'm not going to give up yet. I'll meet you at $80, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, but I'm not sure how much longer I can wait.
